scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf dist && mkdir build && mkdir dist
scripts.copy-static: cp -r src/* dist && cp -r dist/* build && cp -r static/* build
scripts.build-css-dev: npx tailwindcss build  -c tailwind.config.cjs -i ./src/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css && cp dist/styles.css build
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run copy-static && npm run build-css-dev && npm run gabble-debug
scripts.build-css: NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -c tailwind.config.cjs build -i ./src/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css && cp dist/styles.css build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run copy-static && npm run copy-webjsx && npm run build-css && npm run gabble
scripts.build-html: npx tsc && cp dist/page.js build && npm run gabble
